name: Friday Night Funkin - HD Mod
description:
This is a project for people who can't go on GameBanana

Support the original mod on GameBanana here: https://gamebanana.com/mods/166446

Support the original game on itch here:https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

KOLSAN and others have full permission to take this down ( This is not my Mod)
